info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 11:37AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Huerfano, southeastern Costilla and southwestern Las Animas Counties through 1215 PM MDT... At 1136 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stonewall, or 28 miles south of Indian Creek on the southeastern Spring Burn Scar, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stonewall around 1145 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gulnare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
